name: Final Flight - British Airways 767-336ER [G-BNWS] Taxi and Takeoff from Calgary Airport ᴴᴰ
description:
Of the 9 years that British Airways has flown to Calgary, roughly 7 of those have been flown by the trusty 767-300ER. December 4th marks the final day that a British Airways Boeing 767 flew as Speedbird 103 and 102. Future flights will be flown by the 787-8 Dreamliner. You will be missed by the YYC spotters, BA 767! 

Thanks for watching! Please comment, rate, and subscribe!
____________________________________________________
